title: Oh Hi, RiotNurseFlan and KateyKhaos
body:
I've seen RiotNurseFlan and KateyKhaos doing a lot on the boards and seems to be getting engaged with the community and I just wanted to say thanks to them. I know some other rioters are out there too, but dang, look at Red Tracker. All Rioters should be responding to everything, and I think it's super awesome they've been answering everyone's questions and even throwing ideas out!

Thanks RiotNurseFlan and Riot KateyKhaos:)

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=bzRrPGQO,discussion-id=dTGigcAH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-16T23:00:11.053+0000)
>
> Why hello there!

hey, thanks for playing with me on my 1000th normal  win :D

Must I?  That fist looks sharp.  And would probably slow me down, it looks cold.  Possibly even by 30% for 2 seconds in an area around our fist bump.

*leaves quietly*
Seems like a pretty aggressive fistbump :P
I think Riot KateyKhaos is one of the best Rioters :) I also thank all Rioters for supporting us.
